General.Name: Guangdong Jinming Machinery Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Jinming Machinery Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells a range of film processing machinery; and provides integrated solutions for the smart factory in China and internationally. The company offers blown and cast film, and film orientation extrusion machine lines; extrusion lamination machine lines; and coating and lamination machine lines. Its products are used in food packing, daily necessities packaging, agriculture, medical, automotive, electronics, construction, and other applications. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Shantou, China.
